description:
Attaches a Network Interface (a Port) to an Instance using the HuaweiCloud
Compute (Nova) v2 API.

tfcfnid.description: Internal identifier for tracking resource changes. Do not use.

FixedIp.description:
An IP address to assosciate with the port.
_NOTE_: This option cannot be used with port_id. You must specifiy a network_id. The IP address must lie in a range on the supplied network.

InstanceId.description: The ID of the Instance to attach the Port or Network to.

NetworkId.description:
The ID of the Network to attach to an Instance. A port will be created automatically.
_NOTE_: This option and `port_id` are mutually exclusive.

PortId.description:
The ID of the Port to attach to an Instance.
_NOTE_: This option and `network_id` are mutually exclusive.

Region.description:
The region in which to create the interface attachment.
If omitted, the `region` argument of the provider is used. Changing this
creates a new attachment.
